summary: I changed all three levels of the nightingale armor enchantments to something i found more appropriate for my playstyle.
descriptionHtml:
I changed all three levels of the nightingale armor enchantments to something i found more appropriate for my playstyle.

Boots-10,15,25 Fortify Alchemy /15,25,40 Fortify SneakÂ 

Gauntlets-10,15,25 Fortify Pickpocket/Backstab Enchantment

Cuirass-20,35,50 Fortify Stamina/20,35,50 Magic Resist

Hood-15,25,40 Fortify Marksman/15,30,50 Fortify Speech
author: Twiztedice11
